0075.name: Unknown
0075.message:
Unable to connect to the server.

Please try again later.

If you are using a Wi-Fi network, the
signal strength may be poor. Please
ensure that the console is about 6-10
feet away from the network device,
make sure there are no obstructions
between the two, and then try again.

If the problem persists, please
visit support.nintendo.com.
